attributes.action: Bar landlords from the business if they let their properties to illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: Illegal immigrants are criminals.  Landlords who let to illegal immigrants are harbouring fugitives and profiting from illegal activity.  Most importantly they are betraying the many millions of honest people who pay their taxes in this country.  At the very least they should be barred for life from being involved in property letting businesses.  They should also be put in jail for a VERY long time.
